cves.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mikro Software House Software Services Computer Industry and Trade Inc. Zirve Nova allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Zirve Nova: from 235 through 20250131.

affected.vendor: Mikro Software House Software Services Computer Industry and Trade Inc.

problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')
